item.dc:creator: @Mod_Nick1 Mod Nick
item.description:
@Mod_Nick1 wrote:

like, i think lime wire corrupted my computer…

I use CTRL ALT DELETE and lime wires faild start up pops up, and i deleted it off my comp…

i cant even get to my thing to delete all tasks…

Every freaking time i try to do anything this window pops up…

The text inside the textarea reads:

LimeWire version 4.14.8
Java version 1.6.0_02 from Sun Microsystems Inc.
Windows XP v. 5.1 on x86
Free/total memory: 31284712/33357824

com.limegroup.gnutella.gui.GUILoader$StartupFailedException: invalid xml.war
	at com.limegroup.gnutella.gui.GUILoader.sanityCheck(GUILoader.java:292)
	at com.limegroup.gnutella.gui.GUILoader.load(GUILoader.java:57)

	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)

	at com.limegroup.gnutella.gui.Main.main(Main.java:45)

STARTUP ERROR!




FILES IN CURRENT DIRECTORY:
C:\Program Files\limewire\lib
LAST MODIFIED: 1193555205234
SIZE: 0

C:\Program Files\limewire\LimeWire.exe
LAST MODIFIED: 1187301600423
SIZE: 147456

Upon Virus scan, i found a trojan…

Trojan Win32 Vundo.K?

i keep using windows live onecare

it keeps restarting the computer as normall…

then i scan again, and its still there!!!
